name: Lecto Translation
title: Lecto Translation

api_list.name: List Languages
api_list.description: Get a list of supported languages for translation in **ISO-639-1**, **ISO-639-2** or **BCP-47** formats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lecto-translation.p.rapidapi.com/v1/translate/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lecto-translation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lecto-translation.p.rapidapi.com/v1/translate/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lecto-translation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
